title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.76 - Deferred charges
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.76 - Deferred charges

State Regulations

The portion of an expenditure which has been made which
will not be charged against revenue within 12 months following the date of the
statement of operations. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
451.76

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
